title: Show HN: Extension to Replace AI With :duck:
raw_excerpt:
I got kind of tired of seeing the word "AI" and "Artificial Intelligence" everywhere.
Now my reddit and linked in feeds are quite funny:
    Is Agentic :duck: the next big thing in B2B Marketing? Well, maybe.


Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=44939810
Points: 2
# Comments: 0
raw_body:

Now my reddit and linked in feeds are quite funny:

speedrun: A new browser extension humorously replaces mentions of 'AI' with a duck emoji, offering a light-hearted critique of the overuse of the term. This playful tool aims to make social media feeds more entertaining while sparking conversations about the saturation of AI discourse.
why_it_matters: This extension highlights the cultural fatigue surrounding AI terminology, prompting users to reconsider how they engage with tech discussions.
By injecting humor into serious topics, it encourages a more approachable dialogue about technology, potentially attracting a wider audience.

lenses.eli12: A new tool replaces the word 'AI' with a duck emoji in your social media feeds. It's funny and makes reading about technology more enjoyable. This means people can have a laugh while thinking about serious topics.
lenses.pm: Marketers and social media users will find this extension useful for lightening their content. It addresses the problem of AI fatigue and offers a unique way to stand out in a crowded digital space, creating opportunities for engagement.
lenses.engineer: The extension likely uses a simple text replacement algorithm to identify and substitute 'AI' with a duck emoji in real-time. While effective for humor, it may struggle with context, potentially leading to misunderstandings in more serious discussions.
